message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit shy of that price. Would you be willing to come down to $8200?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $8800.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to come down to $8400?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $8600.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to come down to $8300?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $8500. This is my final offer.
